Name: Magnetoencephalographic (MEG) Pitch and Duration Mismatch Negativity (MMN) in First-Episode Psychosis
Funding: R01 MH108568 and MH113533 NIH/United States
EthicsApprovals: All procedures were approved by the University of Pittsburgh IRB and in accordance with the WMA Declaration of Helsinki Ethical Principles for Medical Research Involving Human Subjects.
